Articles.Content:
A few questions I couldn't find answers to. So far...

First off: Flags.

Not what you might think, I know how to make 'em, plant 'em and the works.

But I have two mayor missions in orbit waiting for their respective windows... And only have the default flag on board.

Is there a way to change that without starting over? Maybe start a rendevous vessel that delivers a "new" flag? Or an edit in the persistence file?

It would be a pitty... to go all the way to Duna and not having my own flag with me. Not that the default one is bad....

Second question: Where the hell is Bill? And Willie? I remember even a Charlie Kerman somewhere.

But WHERE?

I looked in the persistence file... the names are there, but it doesn't say where those guys are. I can even find the ships in there... But not the crew.

I even switched through my active ships... Found Bob and Jebediah, but not Willie and Charlie.

I know how to rename them (pretty easy, actually), but I'd rather not do that.

So is there an "easy" way to find them? Or do I have to check each and every vessel, each and every hitchhikers capsule?

Thanks to anyone who read that far...
